titleStmt.title: A stop to the false characterizers hue-and-cry and a reproof to their unfruitful works of darkness. Wherein the folly of B.C. and L.K. is greatly manifested and their malice & envy detected.
titleStmt.author: Lamboll, William.
Buy, John.
Key, Leonard.
Coale, Benjamin.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London, England.
